createBundleInShopify.description: Calls all the necessary Shopify Admin GraphQL API mutations to create a new product, update it's variant, and set metafields for the bundle.

updateBundleInShopify.description: Calls all the necessary Shopify Admin GraphQL API mutations to update a the bundle product, update it's variant, and set metafields for the bundle. This is all dependent on what information is passed to the action.

updateBundleComponentQuantity.description: Sets the value of the productVariantQuantities metafield.

web/routes/index.description: Displays a list of the created bundles which can be expaned to show their components and quantities.

web/routes/bundle.description: The component that handles both the create and update functionality for a bundle.

bundle.description: Used to store data about bundles.

bundleComponent.description: The through records linking bundles to product variants.

install.description: Creates metafield definitions, the cart transform function and fetches information about the shop's sales channels.

create.description: Used to create bundles using the Shopify API.

update.description: Used to update existing bundles using the Shopify API.

webflow.title: Customized bundles
webflow.description: Create and manage bundles of products in the Shopify store.
